text: Welcome to the Fan Art Museum with NCT DREAM!
So many NCTzens sent us fan art for this today,
within the mere span of 12 hours...
- A total of 14,222 pieces of artwork have been collected. - Really?
The most artwork they've received by far.
Hey JISUNG. It's me and you!
They stopped drawing in the middle...
Not just the pen, but also the ladder in the back.
All right. Then, I will personally guide you through
how to enjoy the Fan Art Museum with NCT DREAM.
When the picture is shown, raise your hand if you know the answer.
If you guess the song title correctly, go to the answer zone.
Then, match the choreography and lyrics.
"Sabel" from the Philippines sent this to us.
I was going to do it right away...
You only come to the zone to dance after you get the answer right.
- Only if the answer is right. - OK!
- I got it right. - Oh, it's right?
Let's see how far you take it.
No, no, no, no. I don't think it is.
Exactly. Did you do it like that, JISUNG?
I have never seen that move before.
"넌 나의 나의 마지막 내 마지막 첫사랑."
He didn't do it in the answer zone.
- I did, I did. - Please do it again.
I'm more amazed he got the answer.
"넌 나의 나의 마지막 내 마지막 첫사랑."
His legs are so long, though.
Who do you think they drew?
There are a lot of details.
"Adri" from the U.S. sent us this art.
There's never a time we were on 2 hoverboards...
Look at it without the hoverboard. Then...
This looks like a momentary movement of our choreo...
Why do we have so many leg-spreading choreo?
Why does your arm extend way up here?
I like your passion. Flaunt that in the center.
Due to NCT DREAM's known chaos and loudness, we were unable to retrieve the audio of this scene.
But I really think they drew DOYOUNG.
It kind of looks like "영웅 (英雄; Kick It)."
The artist described their work in 3 words.
Yeah. That's what I was thinking.
There were so many fans who drew the same scene.
Next picture!  - "Aldora" from Indonesia sent this art to us.
I guess it's a part only 3 of us danced.
JAEMIN is the one in the middle?
I know I've done this choreo before!
There was something that does this.
- We know that too - Should we look for the answer together?
You're right. He (JAEMIN) did something like this.
Oh! I think it's "Rise and shine."
They drew this so well. Look at the details, it's crazy.
How can I not remember that?
"Choyeong_01" from Vietnam sent this to us.
3 months of training didn't go to waste.
There's another fan who drew the same scene.
Even the outfit is the same!
I like that kitten the most.
The white one is so cute.
Final Round - I hope it's a hard one.
Our cover of Super Junior's "Black Suit"?
JISUNG! "마지막 첫사랑 (My First and Last)." Right?
We're just listing our songs starting from our debut.
Hint: You have mentioned it today
If you say we've mentioned it earlier today...
Hint #2: The title starts with 'm' sound
Our song that starts with 'm' sound
CHENLE did so well for this one.
We need to self-reflect for not even knowing our own songs.
How was the quiz? - So fun!
It reminded us of the songs we have released before.
It was fun to look at all the fans' different drawing styles.
Basically...  JISUNG is more like Picasso.
It's nothing much. Thanks to you all.
Warm-up mission The best artist of NCT DREAM should re-draw a part of a fan art.
We'll show you the original drawing.
This is art. This is art! OK?
I have tears in my eyes.
In all seriousness, I'm going to draw legitimately.
It'll be funny if you take it seriously, JISUNG. Don't worry.
Did I mention I received an art award back in elementary school?
It's because no one signed up.
- Is that an ear? - Is it a hook?
Hey... It looks like a cup.
Go with your gut, really. This is your artwork.
Hey, why is the forehead so big?
It looks like a brown mussel.
No, it's not... that... bad.... I don't think.
so you can tell I kind of gave up on the hand.
But if you look at the hair...
the left side is slightly lifted.
I took note of that detail (and drew).
Do you think you drew better or the fan?
A little bit... I would say mine is a tiny bit better.
Main mission Draw favorite choreography from "버퍼링 (Glitch Mode)" in 1 minute
I don't know what I'm drawing.
I really wanted to draw well...
Please explain your drawings! - My "버퍼링 (Glitch... Mode)" is...
7 of us are all in a glitch.
Oh, there's an error. The things on the side.
I... I really wanted to draw well, but I can't illustrate it.
I cannot understand it with my limited artistic knowledge.
You're seeing two faces because it's moving like this.
I personally think the detail is amazing...
Not smiling. It glitched in this direction.
Let's do best on our dancing and singing skills.
We need to succeed as singers.
Seeing all of your... pieces of art that you have drawn out for us,
We were the muse for all of your drawings,
but looking at that, you guys eventually become our muse
for whatever we do as well.
I hope we can always give each other...
Please show lots and lots of love and support for "버퍼링 (Glitch Mode)"!
